title: Religion has never caused a war, Atheists did
body:
Religion was created by Atheists to control people through brainwashing. All the wars caused by "religion" were caused by the Atheists who created religion to control the masses.

It's funny how Atheists like to deflect blame onto religion, when it's their own people that forced religion into existence in the first place for their own immoral pursuits.

https://cdn-webimages.wimages.net/0513a6cfb78673963379aee04f81b8f7022ab7-wm.jpg
